pages.text: and that, feel not high over Allah. Surely, I come to you with Sultanim Mobin (‘Evident Power’)
And truly I have sought refuge with my Nourisher-Sustainer and your Nourisher-Sustainer, lest you extern me
And if you developed not Faith because of me, then leave me untouched.”
So (Musa) called upon his Nourisher-Sustainer that: “These (people) are a nation of criminals.”
(Allah said): “Then depart with My Ibad during the night. Surely, you would be pursued people
And cross the sea (while it is) motionless. Verily, they are the forces who stand drowned. ”
How many of the gardens and springs they abandoned
and corn-fields and the noble site
and the grace, they used to be therein as those who enjoy and take delight
Thus (it all happened). And We made another people inherit them
So the heaven and the earth shed no tears for them, and they did not become those who are given respite
And surely indeed, We rescued Bani Israiel from a humiliating torment
(e., ) from Firaun. Surely he was haughty among those who break the limits
And surely indeed, We chose those (Bani Israiel) because of knowledge (they possessed), over the worlds
And We brought before them some of the Signs of that wherein (was evident) a plain trial
Verily, these people will surely say
“It is not but our first death, and we shall not be those who stand revived (into another life)
So approach (us) with our fore-fathers, if you are those who speak the truth!”
Are they better or the nation of Tubba and the people before these? We destroyed them. Surely, they were criminals
And We have not created the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between those two — (behaving as) those who indulge in sport and play

We did not create those two but with a definite purpose, but the majority of those people do not know (that the worldly life-span is for striving, test and reward, while the Hereafter is exclusively for accountability and a permanent reward)
